title: Riot's solution to the disconnect and high packet loss
body:
Put a sticker of reasonable ping over your actual ping, hope for all the comments to go away.

My ping was always around 72 after the server move so it isn't the server move.
[Just a view of the packet loss I have been experiencing since patch 5.18](http://imgur.com/Rtme78e)

replies.body: Naw Riots solution to "lag" is "o the server is lagging? must mean they want more skins, pointless icons and op pointless champs" because all i've noticed is riot only gives a fuck about how much money they can bring in and when we lag they hope it just "goes away" its been going on a week now that ive havent been able to play a full match without 3-7k ping
